pullRequest.body:
We add `PowerBasis.exists_sModEq`.

From `flt-regular`.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10000577012/job/27642994448)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10000577012/job/27642994743)
Can you provide a version with `âˆƒ a, pb.gen âˆ£ b - algebraMap A B a`?

I think the naming convention is
```suggestion
theorem exists_smodEq (pb : PowerBasis A B) (b : B) :
```
judging by how `zmodEq` is used.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: add `PowerBasis.exists_smodEq`
